Name: Constrained optimized water suppression for 1H MRS of Metabolites and Macromolecules in 3 brain regions at 3T using sLASER
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this dataset as: Igwe KC, Gajdošík M, Juchem C, Landheer K. Constrained optimized water suppression for 1H MR spectroscopy. Magn Reson Med. 2025;94(3):895-904. doi:10.1002/mrm.30550
EthicsApprovals: Columbia University Institutional Review Board granted ethical approval for this study (protocol #0807009883)
